name: HeartX Utility Token
description: What is the project about? HeartX is striving to build a trading and community platform with high-quality art content. If you are a creator of digital art and have enthusiasm and interest in entering the Web3 field, and want to establish your fan community, please apply to become our certified artist so that your works can be seen, liked and traded by more people. What can your token be used for? For collector & normal users, HNX can be used to upgrade their level, invest artworks they like, and unlock different rights in app. For artist, HNX can be used to mint their own nft of artworks.
